faq.ans: Fetorzo App is first ever earning Fitness app makes it different from other apps.

faq.ques: 2) Are we make real money by Walking ?
faq.ans: Sure, you can make money just by Walking.

faq.ques: 3) How much money I make through this app ?
faq.ans: It depends how much time you spend on while walking and completing the daily task.

faq.ques: 4) How much distance should I cover so that I will be eligible for coins ?
faq.ans: Atleast 5 meter distance should be covered, eligible for coins

faq.ques: 5) Is there any other way to make money other than Walking ?
faq.ans: Yes, there is one more option through spin the wheel. You will get one free spin daily. And also by seeing ads you will get rewarded another spin to earn.

faq.ques: 7) If I don`t have an account, then can I able to walk ?
faq.ans: Yaa sure, without an account or internet connection, you can measure your distance by our app.

faq.ques: Can I make money without creating an account ?
faq.ans: No, you should create an account to earn money, otherwise you will not be able to earn money.

faq.ques: 9) Can I make money having account but no internet connection ?
faq.ans: When you are going to save your coins, then only you must have internet connection.

faq.ques: 10) How can I withdraw money into my account ?
faq.ans: Withdrawal process is very simple. You can withdraw your amount by Paypal.

faq.ques: 11) Can I earn money through ads ?
faq.ans: No, you will only rewarded a free spin after seeing the ads. You cannot directly make money through ads.

faq.ques: 12) If I withdraw amount at incorrect Paypal ID, then how you will help me ?
faq.ans: Make sure to enter your Paypal ID correctly and revise it. In case, You enter different/Incorrect Paypal ID, first you have to confirm your Mobile Number. If transaction is not completed within 2 working Days, then you can send us email at info.champtech1@gmail.com with your Mobile Number and Username.

faq.ques: 13) How much time it will to complete the transaction ?
faq.ans: It will take 1-2 working Days to complete the transaction. In case you will not get your amount in your Paypal ID. You can contact us at info.champtech1@gmail.com. We will definitely help you out.

faq.ques: 14) How I know that my transaction is completed ?
faq.ans: You will get a notification from us in our app, when transaction is completed.

faq.ques: 15) How many coins make a Dollar ?
16) Does you pay equal coins all over the app ?
faq.ans: No, we have all different payout for each section.

faq.ques: 17) How much I will be paid for every 10 meters in Home section ?
faq.ans: You will get 2 coins for every 10 meters.

faq.ques: 18) How much I will be paid for every task completion in Task section ?
faq.ans: You will get 100 coins for every task completion

faq.ques: 19) How much I will be paid for weekly task completion in Task section ?
faq.ans: You will get 7000 coins for weekly task completion
